bin_fnc_empvehicle.description:
/*

	Description: Sets EMP parameters to a vehicle. Destroys lights and optionally prevents vehicle from starting

	Parameter(s):
		0: OBJECT - Vehicle that will get destroyed electronics
		1: (Optional): BOOL - Sets engine destroyed - true = engine destroyed, false = engine operating (default: true)
		2: (Optional): BOOL - Handle AI in EMP vehicle - true = AI will exit vehicle and not enter new vehicles, false = AI will remain in vehicle (default: true)

	Note that the player has to be defined as bin_player for the voice lines to be spoken

	Examples:

		[bin_vehicle,true,true] call BIN_fnc_empVehicle; //Destroys lights and prevents vehicle from starting, AI will exit vehicle after it has stopped

		[bin_vehicle,false,false] call BIN_fnc_empVehicle; //Destroys lights, but engine can still start and vehicle can be driven, AI will remain in vehicle
*/

bis_fnc_inanglesector.title: BIS_fnc_inAngleSector
bis_fnc_inanglesector.description:
File:BIS_fnc_inAngleSector.jpg500
Checks if a position lies within an angle sector.

args.name: centerAngle : Number - defines the center angle of the sector
sectorWidth
args.desc: defines the width of the sector in degrees

args.name: position
args.desc: the position which should be checked

returns.desc: true if the position lies within the defined sector

bis_fnc_wpformation.title: BIS_fnc_wpFormation
bis_fnc_wpformation.description:
FORMATION custom waypoint.

Player must stay within certain radius and angle towards followed vehicle.

syntaxes.code: Custom Waypoint arguments: [failCode, maxTime, relPos, diffAlt, visualize]

args.name: failCode
args.desc: Code executed if unit spends too long outside formation

args.name:
maxTime: Number - Time required to be spent in formation (default: 0)
* when > 0, waypoint is completed once maxTime was reached
* when <= 0, waypoint is completed only when waypoint condition was met (always false in Function execution), and failCode is executed once maxTime is reached

relPos: Array - in format [relDist, relAngle]:
* relDist: Number - required distance in meters from followed target (default: 100m)
* relAngle Number - required relative angle in degrees from followed target (default: 180)

bis_fnc_wptransport.title: BIS_fnc_wpTransport
bis_fnc_wptransport.description:
TRANSPORT custom waypoint.

Player must pick up group of units in their location.
Get in AI pathfinding is supressed (to avoid unwanted behaviour on building roofs), units are teleported into player's vehicle instead.

bis_fnc_wphover.title: BIS_fnc_wpHover
bis_fnc_wphover.description:
HOVER custom waypoint.
Hover on specific spot.

syntaxes.code: Custom Waypoint arguments: [minTime, reset, altDiff, visualize]

args.name: minTime
args.desc: What time in seconds must be spent hovering before completion

args.name: reset
args.desc: Reset the timer every time you fail hovering

args.name: altDiff
args.desc: How far from the waypoint height must you hover (-1: altitude does not matter, only completionRadius does) (default: -1)

bis_fnc_wpslingloaddrop.title: BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadDrop
bis_fnc_wpslingloaddrop.description:
DROP SLINGLOAD custom waypoint.

Drop an object which was previously loaded using BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadAttach

bis_fnc_wprestricted.title: BIS_fnc_wpRestricted
bis_fnc_wprestricted.description:
RESTRICTED custom waypoint.

Player must fly in given limits.

syntaxes.code: Custom Waypoint arguments: [limits, maxTime, failCode, visualize, warnCode]

args.name:
failCode: Array - flight limits in format [minAlt, maxAlt, minSpeed, maxSpeed]:
* minAlt: Number - minimal altitude in meters above ground level (default: -1)
* maxAlt: Number - maximal altitude in meters above ground level (default: 60)
* minSpeed: Number - minimal speed in km/h (default: -1)
* maxSpeed: Number - maximal speed in km/h (default: -1)
maxTime
args.desc: how much time spent outside of the limits will lead to fail (default: -1)

args.name: failCode
args.desc: code executed when maxTime is reached (default: {})

args.name: warnCode
args.desc: code executed when unit get out of limits (default: {})

bis_fnc_wpsteady.title: BIS_fnc_wpSteady
bis_fnc_wpsteady.description:
FLY STEADY custom waypoint.

Keep helicopter's pitch, bank, relative velocity a relative vector in given limits

syntaxes.code: Custom Waypoint arguments: [limitArray, failLimit, failCode, warningCode, positiveCode]

args.name:
limitArray: Array - in format [deltaVelocity, deltaVector, vector]:
* deltaVelocity: Number - how much can velocity change (default: 20)
* deltaVector: Number - how much can vector direction change (default: 1.5)
* vector: Number - absolute vector limits for pitch and bank in degrees (default: 45)
failLimit
args.desc: what time in seconds spent outside of limits will lead to fail (default: -1)

args.name: failCode
args.desc: code executed when waypoint fails - time spent outside of limits reached failLimit (default: {})

args.name: warningCode
args.desc: code spawned every time vehicle is outside of limits (default: {})

args.name: positiveCode
args.desc: code spawned every time vehicle is inside of limits (default: {})

bis_fnc_wpwinchload.title: BIS_fnc_wpWinchLoad
bis_fnc_wpwinchload.description:
WINCH LOAD custom waypoint.

Load a group into helicopter cargo using winch.

syntaxes.code: Custom Waypoint arguments: [limitHeight, winchID, crewman, failCode, loadCode]

args.name: winchID
args.desc: ID of vehicle's winch position. Positions are defined in vehicle's config under RopePositions >> Winch (default: 0)

args.name: crewman
args.desc: person going down on a rope (default: 2nd person in vehicle's crew)

args.name: failCode
args.desc: code executed when anything happens to persons on rope (default: {})

args.name: loadCode
args.desc: code executed everytime person from a group is selected to be loaded into helicopter (default: {})

bis_fnc_wpcheckpoint.title: BIS_fnc_wpCheckpoint
bis_fnc_wpcheckpoint.description:
CHECKPOINT custom waypoint.

Player has to reach waypoint position with certain precision (as opposed to normal Move waypoint, which became completed in around 500m).

args.name: posLimit
args.desc: time in seconds unit is required to stay withing waypoint completion radius (default: -1)

bis_fnc_wpslingloadattach.title: BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadAttach
bis_fnc_wpslingloadattach.description:
ATTACH SLINGLOAD custom waypoint.

Load an object to rope.

args.name: posLimit: Number or Boolean - Time in seconds it takes to attach the cargo. When true, cargo is attached immediately (default: -1)
failCode
args.desc: code executed if rope is cut by accident (e.g. collision with another object) (default: {})

bis_fnc_wptimed.title: BIS_fnc_wpTimed
bis_fnc_wptimed.description:
COUNTDOWN custom waypoint.

Player has to reach waypoint area before time runs out.

args.name: failCode
args.desc: (Optional, default  inline{} code executed when time runs oout before player reach the waypoint

args.name: showHint
args.desc: (Optional, default false) true to show info about time left

bis_fnc_wpfastrope.title: BIS_fnc_wpFastRope
bis_fnc_wpfastrope.description:
FAST-ROPE custom waypoint.

Let everybody in vehicles' cargo space rappel down on a rope.

args.name: fastropeID
args.desc: ID of vehicle's fast-rope position. Positions are defined in vehicle's config under RopePositions >> Fastrope

bis_fnc_wpangle.title: BIS_fnc_wpAngle
bis_fnc_wpangle.description:
CIRCLE custom waypoint.
Keep helicopter rotated in given vector toward target.

syntaxes.code: Custom Waypoint arguments: [circleLimit, circleBorder, circleDir, customCond, hint]

args.name: circleLimit
args.desc: what time in seconds must be spent withing limit (default: 0)

args.name: circleBorder
args.desc: precision tolerance (smaller number means more precision) (default: 0.75)

args.name: circleDir: Number or Array - limit - direction or vector towards target (default: view of 2nd crew member - left (-90) or right (90))
customCond
args.desc: additional condition required for waypoint completion. Passed arguments are [_veh,_target]. (default: {true})

args.name: hint
args.desc: formatted hint. %1 is value showing how precise current vector is (in percents), %2 is precent symbol "%1" (default: "%1%2")

bis_fnc_returnchildren.title: BIS_fnc_returnChildren
bis_fnc_returnchildren.description: Returns all subclasses within given class.

args.name: depth
args.desc: Depth, (0 = return only subclasses, 1 = return subclasses of subclasses, and so on...

args.name: lastTier
args.desc: (Optional, default true) false to return only the last one, true to return all classes

args.name: firstTier
args.desc: (Optional, default true) true to return the first class, false to return only the last one

bis_fnc_wpslingloaddetach.title: BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadDetach
bis_fnc_wpslingloaddetach.description:
DETACH SLINGLOAD custom waypoint.

Unload an object which was previously loaded using BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadAttach.

args.name: posLimit: Number  - Time in seconds it takes to detach the cargo (default: -1)
limitDir
args.desc: direction range in which cargo has to be detached (default: [0,360])

bis_fnc_3denexportsqf.title: BIS_fnc_3DENExportSQF
bis_fnc_3denexportsqf.description: Export 3DEN mission to SQF script. When called, the script will dynamically recreate the mission.

args.name: showWindow
args.desc: (Optional, default true) true to show window with script code

args.name: exportLayers
args.desc: (Optional, default true) true to export layers as conditions (it's possible to create only specific layers using params passed to the exported script)

args.name: center: Array format Position - (Optional, default [0,0,0]) Center position, all entity positions will be exported as relative
checkBlacklist
args.desc: (Optional, default false) true to export with check if specific entity ID was blacklisted

bis_fnc_exp_camp_sitrep.title: BIS_fnc_EXP_camp_SITREP
bis_fnc_exp_camp_sitrep.description:
Displays multiple lines of text in given order.
File:BIS_fnc_EXP camp SITREP.gif400

args.name:
line#: Array - lines to be displayed, format [text, fadeInTime, waitTime, fadeOutTime]:
* 0: text: String - text to be displayed
* 1: fadeInTime: Number - (Optional, default 2) fade-in duration in seconds
* 2: waitTime: Number - (Optional, default 1) how many seconds to wait before showing the next line
* 3: fadeOutTime: String - (Optional, default 2) fade-out duration in seconds. It is only used by the last line. Fades all other lines as well

returns.desc: true if successful, false if not

bis_fnc_holdkey.title: BIS_fnc_holdKey
bis_fnc_holdkey.description: Function that executes a user-defined code when a key has been held down for a long enough time.

syntaxes.code: [display, key, time, code, control] call BIS_fnc_holdKey

args.name: display
args.desc: display the event is attached to. By default it is the map display

args.name: key
args.desc: what key to press. See DIK KeyCodes

args.name: time
args.desc: how long the key has to be held down in seconds

args.name: code
args.desc: code to be executed when key is held down for long enough. canSuspend returns true inside the code

args.name: control
args.desc: (Optional, default controlNull - Text control to be used in place of the default "Press X to skip" control.

bis_fnc_initslidervalue.title: BIS_fnc_initSliderValue
bis_fnc_initslidervalue.description: Initialises a slider attribute control within the Eden Editor. Can also be used outside of Eden Editor.

args.name: ctrlSlider
args.desc: Slider control, usually the first control within the controls group

args.name: ctrlEdit
args.desc: Edit Box, usually the second control within the controls group

args.name: unit
args.desc: Measurement unit added behind the number within the edit box ("%" by default)

args.name: default
args.desc: When present, only the value is set, functionality is not initialized

bis_fnc_guimessage.title: BIS_fnc_guiMessage
bis_fnc_guimessage.description: Shows customized native message box to user.

syntaxes.code: [message, header, position, isCancel, parent, pause] spawn BIS_fnc_guiMessage

args.name:
message: String, Structured Text or Array:
* String or Structured Text - message
* Array - listbox, every item is defined as String (enabled) or String in Array (disabled)
When variable BIS_fnc_guiMessage_cursel is defined as a Number, item with this index will be selected.
header: String or Structured Text - (Optional, default "") header text
isCancel: Boolean or Array - (Optional, default true) true to display cancel button or array with button texts [okText, cancelText]
pause
args.desc: (Optional) true to pause simulation when message window is open

bis_fnc_om_module_initsmallvaluesilder.title: BIS_fnc_OM_Module_initSmallValueSilder
bis_fnc_om_module_initsmallvaluesilder.description: Initialize slider with edit box showing its value supporting small decimal numbers.

args.name: unit
args.desc: (Optional, default "%") Measurement unit added behind the number

args.name: defaultValue
args.desc: (Optional, default nil) When present, only the value is set, functionality is not initialized

bis_fnc_om_savegame.title: BIS_fnc_OM_saveGame
bis_fnc_om_savegame.description: Saves the game - simply calls saveGame.

bis_fnc_drawboundingbox.title: BIS_fnc_drawBoundingBox
bis_fnc_drawboundingbox.description: Draws bounding box around given objects.

args.name: color: Array in format Color (RGBA) - (Optional, default [1,0,1,1])
draw
args.desc: (Optional, default nil) true to draw, false to remove

returns.desc: true is successful, false if not

bis_fnc_vectordivide.title: BIS_fnc_vectorDivide
bis_fnc_vectordivide.description: Divides vector by scalar, by dividing all vector elements.

args.name: vector: Array of Numbers - (Optional, default [0,0,0]) can be any array of numbers

bis_fnc_removeallscriptedeventhandlers.title: BIS_fnc_removeAllScriptedEventHandlers
bis_fnc_removeallscriptedeventhandlers.description:
Removes all scripted event handler with given name.
Additionally "ScriptedEventHandlerRemoved" scripted EH is called for every removed event handler.

args.name: namespace: Namespace, Object, Group, Location, Boolean, Control or Display - namespace in which handler is saved

returns.desc: false if never existed, true otherwise

bis_som_addsupportrequestfunc.title: BIS_SOM_addSupportRequestFunc
bis_som_addsupportrequestfunc.description: Function behind the Secondary Operations Manager module.

args.name:
secops: Array of Strings - values can be:
* "transport"
* "aerial_reconnaissance"
* "supply_drop"
* "tactical_airstrike"
* "artillery_barrage"
* "gunship_run"

bis_fnc_zoomlockeh.title: BIS_fnc_zoomLockEH
bis_fnc_zoomlockeh.description: Event handler function for locking the camera.

args.name: position
args.desc: Position that the camera should focus

bin_fnc_getidwmapparams.title: BIN_fnc_getIDWMapParams
bin_fnc_getidwmapparams.description:
/*
		Killzone_Kid

	Description:
		Returns currently set IDWMap params

	Parameter(s):
		NONE

	Returns:
		ARRAY in format: [[mapMinX, mapMinY, mapMaxX, mapMaxY], idwCellSize, idwSpreadRadius, idwSpreadPower, curvePointsInterval, curvePointSpreadRadius] 
		or 
		[] on error
		
	Example:
		call BIN_fnc_getIDWMapParams
*/

bin_fnc_setidwmapstaticdatalayers.title: BIN_fnc_setIDWMapStaticDataLayers
bin_fnc_setidwmapstaticdatalayers.description:
/*
		Killzone_Kid

	Description:
		Sets static data for extension use from argument or config "CfgIDWMap"

	Parameter(s):
		ARRAY (optional) - static data in format:
		[
			[[x,y,strengh],[x,y,strengh],...], // data layer 0
			[[x,y,strengh],[x,y,strengh],...], // data layer 1
			...
			[[x,y,strengh],[x,y,strengh],...] // data layer N
		]

	Returns:
		BOOL - true on success
		
	Example:
		call BIN_fnc_setIDWMapStaticDataLayers
*/

bin_fnc_diag_getallareaobjects.title: BIN_fnc_diag_getAllAreaObjects
bin_fnc_diag_getallareaobjects.description:
/*
		Killzone_Kid

	Description:
		Returns stored area objects for diagnostics

	Parameter(s):
		0: STRING - area name
		1: NUMBER - multipart number

	Returns:
		ARRAY of arays in format [[posX,posY,posMinZ,posMaxZ,radius],...]
		
	Example:
		"MyArea" call BIN_fnc_diag_getAllAreaObjects
*/

bin_fnc_getidwmapstaticdatalayers.title: BIN_fnc_getIDWMapStaticDataLayers
bin_fnc_getidwmapstaticdatalayers.description:
/*
		Killzone_Kid

	Description:
		Gets static data from extension

	Parameter(s):
		NONE

	Returns:
		ARRAY in format:
		[
			[[x,y,strengh],[x,y,strengh],...], // data layer 0
			[[x,y,strengh],[x,y,strengh],...], // data layer 1
			...
			[[x,y,strengh],[x,y,strengh],...] // data layer N
		]
		or 
		[] - on error

		
	Example:
		call BIN_fnc_getIDWMapStaticDataLayers
*/

bis_fnc_exp_camp_dynamicaiskill.title: BIS_fnc_EXP_camp_dynamicAISkill
bis_fnc_exp_camp_dynamicaiskill.description: Changes AI skill based on player count, responding to player connected / player disconnected events. This function does exactly the same as BIS_fnc_EXP_camp_setSkill execept that it automatically executes when a player joins or disconnects.

args.name: mode
args.desc: (Optional, default true) true to enable, false to disable

args.name: affectedSides
args.desc: Array of affected sides and their skill sets. For details see BIS_fnc_EXP_camp_setSkill

bis_fnc_exp_camp_playsubtitles.title: BIS_fnc_EXP_camp_playSubtitles
bis_fnc_exp_camp_playsubtitles.description: Displays the given subtitles at the correctly defined moments. Each array added to the parameters represents one subtitle.

args.name:
subtitleDetailN: Array - format [speaker, text, timing]:
* speaker: String - speaker's name
* text: String - subtitle
* timing: Number - time at which the subtitle is played

returns.desc: true if successful, false if not
IDC, returns -1 if control was not found

bis_fnc_dynamicgroups.title: BIS_fnc_dynamicGroups
bis_fnc_dynamicgroups.description: Function that adds dynamic groups to the mission as seen in End Game. Function needs to be initialized on server and client. Clients can then use action TeamSwitch ("U" by default) to access the Dynamic Groups interface.

args.name:
mode: String - mode, can be:
* "Initialize" - Initializes dynamic groups on the server
* "Terminate" - Terminates dynamic groups on the server
* "InitializePlayer" - Does client side initialization
* "TerminatePlayer" - Does client side termination
* "IsInitialized" - Checks whether dynamic groups was initialized
* "RegisterGroup" - Registers a group
* "UnregisterGroup" - Unregisters a group
* "IsGroupRegistered" - Whether a group was already registered or not
* "SetName" - Sets the name of the group, in future, will also update GroupId of the group
* "SetPrivateState" - Set the private state of a group
* "SwitchLeader" - Switches the leader of given group to the given player
* "AddGroupMember" - Add a group member to group
* "RemoveGroupMember" - Switches a player from one group to another
* "KickPlayer" - Kicks a player from group, player wont be able to join the group unless invited or is unkicked using UnKickPlayer
* "UnKickPlayer" - Unkicks a player from a group
* "WasPlayerKickedFrom" - Whether given player was kicked from given group
* "GetAllGroups" - Returns all registered and valid groups
params
args.desc: parameter changes according to . Check the function in the Functions Viewer for detailed information

args.name: mode
args.desc: (Optional, default "Open") case-sensitive. Can be "Open"; other cases are for internal use

args.name:
params: Anything - (Optional, default []) depending on mode, can be:
* "Open": [fullGarage, garageCentre]
** fullGarage: Boolean - (Optional, default false)
** garageCentre: Object - (Optional, default objNull) the garage centre as vehicle; will be deleted on opening

bis_fnc_isthrowable.title: BIS_fnc_isThrowable
bis_fnc_isthrowable.description: Returns true if given magazine is throwable

bis_fnc_holdactionremove.title: BIS_fnc_holdActionRemove
bis_fnc_holdactionremove.description: Removes a hold action. This does exactly the same as removeAction.

args.name: target
args.desc: Object the action is attached to

returns.desc: Task type or type 'Default' if not defined.

bis_fnc_tasksetalwaysvisible.title: BIS_fnc_taskSetAlwaysVisible
bis_fnc_tasksetalwaysvisible.description: Flags task to be or not to be always visible.

args.name: alwaysVisible
args.desc: true for always visible false if not

bis_fnc_showrespawnmenudisableitem.title: BIS_fnc_showRespawnMenuDisableItem
bis_fnc_showrespawnmenudisableitem.description:
Disables respawn loadout, role or position for Arma 3: Respawn.
* Only role or only loadout can be limited at one moment, if there is limit for both, then only role uses limit.
* If the limit definition for role is called multiple times with different numbers, then the highest number is used. 
* If disabling a position then respawnReference must be supplied

syntaxes.code: [mode, uiControl, listboxItem, message, respawnReference] call BIS_fnc_showRespawnMenuDisableItem

args.name: mode
args.desc: Available options are disable, enable and state

args.name:
uiControl: Control - List in which item should be disabled/enabled
*BIS_RscRespawnControlsMap_ctrlLocList
*BIS_RscRespawnControlsMap_ctrlRoleList
*BIS_RscRespawnControlsMap_ctrlComboLoadout
listboxItem: Number or String - Index or name of item in the respawn loadout/role/position listbox
message
args.desc: Message shown when disabled item is selected, use "" for default message

args.name: respawnReference
args.desc: Reference to respawn position either Marker name or Object var name

bis_fnc_tasktypeicon.title: BIS_fnc_taskTypeIcon
bis_fnc_tasktypeicon.description: Returns path to the icon texture associated with given task type.

args.name: default
args.desc: Config path to get default path from, if type does not exist

returns.desc: Path to the task type texture.

bis_fnc_showsubtitle.title: BIS_fnc_showSubtitle
bis_fnc_showsubtitle.description: Displays a subtitle at the bottom of the screen.

bis_fnc_tasksettype.title: BIS_fnc_taskSetType
bis_fnc_tasksettype.description: Sets task type to given task.

bis_fnc_weaponaddon.title: BIS_fnc_weaponAddon
bis_fnc_weaponaddon.description: Return addon from CfgPatches to which a given weapon class belongs to.

bis_fnc_weaponcomponents.title: BIS_fnc_weaponComponents
bis_fnc_weaponcomponents.description: Returns array with classname of the parent weapon (without attachments), followed by classnames of all its attachments.

returns.desc: true if the subject was found and selected

bis_fnc_dynamictext.title: BIS_fnc_dynamicText
bis_fnc_dynamictext.description:
Shows dynamic opening credits or any type of text.
File:BIS_fnc_dynamicText_v2.gif400

syntaxes.code: [text, x, y, duration, fadeInTime, deltaY, rscLayer] spawn BIS_fnc_dynamicText

args.name:
x: Number or Array - (Optional, default -1)
* Number - Position in x
* Array
** 0: Position in x
** 1: Width of the control

y: Number or Array - (Optional, default -1)
* Number - Position in y
* Array
** 0: Position in y
** 1: Height of the control

deltaY: Number - (Optional, default 0) Y position delta:
* = 0: Text will not move
* > 0: Text will move down
* < 0: Text will move up
duration and the absolute deltaY value will influence the movement speed.

bis_fnc_wpaerobatics.title: BIS_fnc_wpAerobatics
bis_fnc_wpaerobatics.description:
AEROBATICS custom waypoint.

Player must perform all the required manoeuvres:
* "hover_turn_360"
* "hover_bow"
* "fast_turn_180"
* "backwards"
* "strafe"

args.name: visuals
args.desc: should dynamic text appear on startup and completion

args.name: detectionCode
args.desc: code executed once the helicopter is ready (speed < 10 km/h)

bis_fnc_setrain.title: BIS_fnc_setRain
bis_fnc_setrain.description: A helper function for setting rainParams in multiplayer. The call to the function could be placed in init.sqf to sync rainParams between all clients and JIP. Alternatively execute on server.

args.name: rainParams: Array or Config - custom  RainParticles params, see rainParams. Use empty array [] or configNull to reset to default values

bis_fnc_wpland.title: BIS_fnc_wpLand
bis_fnc_wpland.description: "LAND" custom waypoint. Land on specific spot.

args.name:
dirParam: Array - in format [dir, dirDiff]:
* dir: Number - required landing direction in degrees
* dirDiff: Number - direction tolerance (to both sides)

cba_fnc_switchableattachments.title: CBA_fnc_switchableAttachments
cba_fnc_switchableattachments.description: Returns all attachments the item can eventually switch to.

cba_accessory_fnc_switchattachment.title: CBA_accessory_fnc_switchAttachment
cba_accessory_fnc_switchattachment.description: Switches weapon accessories for the player.

cba_fnc_addwaypoint.title: CBA_fnc_addWaypoint
cba_fnc_addwaypoint.description: A function used to add a waypoint to a group.

cba_fnc_buildingpositions.title: CBA_fnc_buildingPositions
cba_fnc_buildingpositions.description: Reports positions of the building including nearby custom building positions.

args.name: _max
args.desc: Maximum number of positions. (optional, default: all)

cba_fnc_searchnearby.title: CBA_fnc_searchNearby
cba_fnc_searchnearby.description: A function for a group to search a nearby building.

cba_fnc_clearwaypoints.title: CBA_fnc_clearWaypoints
cba_fnc_clearwaypoints.description: A function used to correctly clear all waypoints from a group.

cba_fnc_taskattack.title: CBA_fnc_taskAttack
cba_fnc_taskattack.description: A function for a group to attack a parsed location.

cba_fnc_taskdefend.title: CBA_fnc_taskDefend
cba_fnc_taskdefend.description:
A function for a group to defend a parsed location. Should be ran locally.

    Units will mount nearby static machine guns and garrison in nearby buildings.
    10% chance to patrol the radius unless specified differently (100% when no available building positions).
    0% chance to hold defensive positions in combat unless specified differently.

cba_fnc_tasksearcharea.title: CBA_fnc_taskSearchArea
cba_fnc_tasksearcharea.description:
Given group will indefinitely randomly search the given marker/trigger area.

    Will also perform random building searches.

cba_fnc_taskpatrol.title: CBA_fnc_taskPatrol
cba_fnc_taskpatrol.description: A function for a group to randomly patrol a parsed radius and location.

cba_fnc_filter.title: CBA_fnc_filter
cba_fnc_filter.description:
Filter each element of an array via a function.

    Data passed to the function on each iteration,
    * _x - Element of _array.

cba_fnc_findmax.title: CBA_fnc_findMax
cba_fnc_findmax.description: Find largest numeric value with index in an array.

cba_fnc_findmin.title: CBA_fnc_findMin
cba_fnc_findmin.description: Find smallest numeric value with index in an array.

cba_fnc_findtypename.title: CBA_fnc_findTypeName
cba_fnc_findtypename.description: Returns the index of the first entry of the given type in an array.

cba_fnc_findnil.title: CBA_fnc_findNil
cba_fnc_findnil.description: A function that returns the index of the first empty (nil) entry in an array.

cba_fnc_findnull.title: CBA_fnc_findNull
cba_fnc_findnull.description: A function that returns the index of the first null entry in an array.

cba_fnc_findtypeof.title: CBA_fnc_findTypeOf
cba_fnc_findtypeof.description:
Returns the index of the first entry of a given type in an array.

   The type argument is either an object or a class name string.

cba_fnc_getarraydiff.title: CBA_fnc_getArrayDiff
cba_fnc_getarraydiff.description: A function used to return the differences between two arrays.

cba_fnc_inject.title: CBA_fnc_inject
cba_fnc_inject.description:
Accumulates a value by passing elements of an array "through" a function.

    Data passed to the function on each iteration,
    * _accumulator - Value passed from last iteration, set to _initial for the
        first iteration.
    * _x - Element of _array.

cba_fnc_getarrayelements.title: CBA_fnc_getArrayElements
cba_fnc_getarrayelements.description: A function used to return the element counts in an array.

cba_fnc_join.title: CBA_fnc_join
cba_fnc_join.description:
Joins an array of values into a single string.

    Eeach value is joined around a separator string. Inverse of <CBA_fnc_split>.

cba_fnc_insert.title: CBA_fnc_insert
cba_fnc_insert.description:
Inserts an array of elements to given array at the specified index.

    Modifies the original array (Thanks BaerMitUmlaut)

cba_fnc_reject.title: CBA_fnc_reject
cba_fnc_reject.description: Reject array elements for which the block returns true

cba_fnc_selectrandomarray.title: CBA_fnc_selectRandomArray
cba_fnc_selectrandomarray.description: Select a specified amount of elements from an array without picking the same element multiple times.

cba_fnc_select.title: CBA_fnc_select
cba_fnc_select.description: Select array elements for which the block returns true

cba_fnc_selectbest.title: CBA_fnc_selectBest
cba_fnc_selectbest.description: Select best element from an array

cba_fnc_sortnestedarray.title: CBA_fnc_sortNestedArray
cba_fnc_sortnestedarray.description:
Sorts the given nested array in either ascending or descending order based on the
    numerical value at specified index of sub arrays.

    Original array is modified.

cba_fnc_shuffle.title: CBA_fnc_shuffle
cba_fnc_shuffle.description: Shuffles an array's contents into random order.

cba_fnc_actionargument.title: CBA_fnc_actionArgument
cba_fnc_actionargument.description: Used to call the code parsed in the addaction argument.

cba_fnc_addbackpackcargo.title: CBA_fnc_addBackpackCargo
cba_fnc_addbackpackcargo.description:
Add backpack(s) to vehicle cargo.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _container, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to add _item to _container true in case of success.

cba_fnc_additem.title: CBA_fnc_addItem
cba_fnc_additem.description:
Add an item to a unit.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in
    case of trouble, or when able to add _item to _unit true in case of success.

cba_fnc_addbinocularmagazine.title: CBA_fnc_addBinocularMagazine
cba_fnc_addbinocularmagazine.description:
Adds a magazine to the units rangefinder.

    Note that this breaks the unique magazine ids due to the usage of setUnitLoadout.

cba_fnc_additemcargo.title: CBA_fnc_addItemCargo
cba_fnc_additemcargo.description:
Add item(s) to vehicle cargo.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _container, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to add _item to _container true in case of success.

cba_fnc_addmagazine.title: CBA_fnc_addMagazine
cba_fnc_addmagazine.description:
Add magazine to a vehicle/unit.

    The function also verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in
    case of trouble, or true when able to add _item to _unit.

cba_fnc_addmagazinecargo.title: CBA_fnc_addMagazineCargo
cba_fnc_addmagazinecargo.description:
Add magazine(s) to a vehicle's cargo.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _container, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to add _item to _container true in case of success.

cba_fnc_addplayeraction.title: CBA_fnc_addPlayerAction
cba_fnc_addplayeraction.description:
Adds persistent action to the player.

    The action will be available in vehicles and after respawn or teamswitch.

    Remove action with <CBA_fnc_removePlayerAction>. *Do not* use standard
    removeAction command with these player-action indices!

cba_fnc_addweaponcargo.title: CBA_fnc_addWeaponCargo
cba_fnc_addweaponcargo.description:
Add weapon(s) to vehicle cargo.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _container, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to add _item to _container true in case of success.

cba_fnc_addweapon.title: CBA_fnc_addWeapon
cba_fnc_addweapon.description:
Add a weapon to a unit. Unit has to be local.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in
    case of trouble, or when able to add _item to _unit true in case of success.

cba_fnc_addperframehandler.title: CBA_fnc_addPerFrameHandler
cba_fnc_addperframehandler.description: Add a handler that will execute every frame, or every x number of seconds.

args.name: _args
args.desc: Parameters passed by this function. Same as '_args' above.

args.name: _handle
args.desc: A number representing the handle of the function. Same as '_handle' returned by this function.

cba_fnc_binocularmagazine.title: CBA_fnc_binocularMagazine
cba_fnc_binocularmagazine.description: Returns the magazine of the units rangefinder.

cba_fnc_addweaponwithoutitems.title: CBA_fnc_addWeaponWithoutItems
cba_fnc_addweaponwithoutitems.description:
Adds weapon to unit without attachments and without taking a magazine.

    Does not work on vehicles.
    Attempts to keep magazine ids for unrelated magazines.

cba_fnc_canuseweapon.title: CBA_fnc_canUseWeapon
cba_fnc_canuseweapon.description: Checks if the unit can currently use a weapon.

cba_fnc_canadditem.title: CBA_fnc_canAddItem
cba_fnc_canadditem.description:
Checks if unit has enough free space in inventory to store item.

    Doesn't take current unit load into account unlike canAdd command.

cba_fnc_compilefinal.title: CBA_fnc_compileFinal
cba_fnc_compilefinal.description: Defines a function in mission namespace and prevents it from being overwritten.

cba_fnc_compatiblemagazines.title: CBA_fnc_compatibleMagazines
cba_fnc_compatiblemagazines.description: Retrieves a list of magazines that are compatible with a weapon.

cba_fnc_createnamespace.title: CBA_fnc_createNamespace
cba_fnc_createnamespace.description:
Creates a namespace. Used to store and read variables via setVariable and getVariable.

    The Namespace is destroyed after the mission ends.

cba_fnc_createperframehandlerobject.title: CBA_fnc_createPerFrameHandlerObject
cba_fnc_createperframehandlerobject.description: Creates a PFH object, that will execute code every frame, or every x number of seconds.

cba_fnc_createmarker.title: CBA_fnc_createMarker
cba_fnc_createmarker.description: Creates a marker all at once.

cba_fnc_currentmagazineindex.title: CBA_fnc_currentMagazineIndex
cba_fnc_currentmagazineindex.description: Finds out the magazine ID of the currently loaded magazine of given unit.

cba_fnc_currentunit.title: CBA_fnc_currentUnit
cba_fnc_currentunit.description: Returns the controlled unit. ("player" or remote controlled unit via zeus)

cba_fnc_createtrigger.title: CBA_fnc_createTrigger
cba_fnc_createtrigger.description: Create a trigger all at once.

cba_fnc_deletenamespace.title: CBA_fnc_deleteNamespace
cba_fnc_deletenamespace.description: Deletes a namespace created with CBA_fnc_createNamespace.

cba_fnc_deleteentity.title: CBA_fnc_deleteEntity
cba_fnc_deleteentity.description: A function used to delete entities

cba_fnc_deleteperframehandlerobject.title: CBA_fnc_deletePerFrameHandlerObject
cba_fnc_deleteperframehandlerobject.description: Deletes a PFH object that was previously created via CBA_fnc_createPerFrameHandlerObject

cba_fnc_dropitem.title: CBA_fnc_dropItem
cba_fnc_dropitem.description:
Drops an item.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to remove _item from _unit true in case of success

cba_fnc_dropmagazine.title: CBA_fnc_dropMagazine
cba_fnc_dropmagazine.description:
Drops a magazine.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to remove _item from _unit true in case of success.

cba_fnc_execnextframe.title: CBA_fnc_execNextFrame
cba_fnc_execnextframe.description: Executes a code once in non sched environment on the next frame.

cba_fnc_dropweapon.title: CBA_fnc_dropWeapon
cba_fnc_dropweapon.description:
Drops a weapon (including binocular).

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to remove _item from _unit true in case of success

cba_fnc_getactivefeaturecamera.title: CBA_fnc_getActiveFeatureCamera
cba_fnc_getactivefeaturecamera.description:
Returns active feature camera.

    Checks for the following feature cameras:
    - Curator
    - Arsenal camera (BIS_fnc_arsenal)
    - Nexus Spectator (BIS_fnc_EGSpectator)
    - Establishing shot (BIS_fnc_establishingShot)
    - Splendid camera (BIS_fnc_camera)
    - Animation viewer (BIS_fnc_animViewer)
    - Classic camera (BIS_fnc_cameraOld)

    And cameras registered via CBA_fnc_registerFeatureCamera.

cba_fnc_getanimtype.title: CBA_fnc_getAnimType
cba_fnc_getanimtype.description:
Used to determine which weapon unit is currently holding and return proper
    animation type.

    Main types are for pistol, rifle and no weapon.

cba_fnc_directcall.title: CBA_fnc_directCall
cba_fnc_directcall.description: Executes a piece of code in unscheduled environment.

cba_fnc_getalive.title: CBA_fnc_getAlive
cba_fnc_getalive.description: A function used to find out who is alive in an array or a group.

cba_fnc_getarea.title: CBA_fnc_getArea
cba_fnc_getarea.description: Returns the array form of any area construct: [center, a, b, angle, isRectangle]

cba_fnc_findentity.title: CBA_fnc_findEntity
cba_fnc_findentity.description: A function used to find out the first entity of parsed type in a nearEntitys call

cba_fnc_getdistance.title: CBA_fnc_getDistance
cba_fnc_getdistance.description: A function used to find out the distance between two positions.

cba_fnc_getarg.title: CBA_fnc_getArg
cba_fnc_getarg.description: Get default named argument from list.

cba_fnc_getfirer.title: CBA_fnc_getFirer
cba_fnc_getfirer.description:
A function used to find out which unit exactly fired.

    Replacement for gunner, on multi-turret vehicles.

cba_fnc_getconfigentry.title: CBA_fnc_getConfigEntry
cba_fnc_getconfigentry.description:
Gets a configuration entry.

    Will check if _cfg exists, and will return either the config value, or
    supplied default value.

cba_fnc_getgroupindex.title: CBA_fnc_getGroupIndex
cba_fnc_getgroupindex.description:
Finds out the actual ID number of a person within his group as assigned by
    the game and used in the squad leader's command menu.

    This is not just the order within the units of his group (this order can
    change due to players joining and leaving the game, deaths or promotions).

    Inspired by the OFP function, squadNumber.sqf, by General Barron
    (http://www.ofpec.com/ed_depot/index_new.php?action=details&id=139&page=1&game=OFP&type=fu&cat=xyz)

cba_fnc_getgroup.title: CBA_fnc_getGroup
cba_fnc_getgroup.description: A function used to find out the group of an object.

cba_fnc_getitemconfig.title: CBA_fnc_getItemConfig
cba_fnc_getitemconfig.description: A function used to return the config of an item.

cba_fnc_getnearestbuilding.title: CBA_fnc_getNearestBuilding
cba_fnc_getnearestbuilding.description: Find the nearest building and number of building positions available.

cba_fnc_getnonpresetclass.title: CBA_fnc_getNonPresetClass
cba_fnc_getnonpresetclass.description: Get ancestor class of a weapon or container which has no preset attachments/contents.

cba_fnc_getnearest.title: CBA_fnc_getNearest
cba_fnc_getnearest.description:
Find out the nearest entity parsed in an array to a position.

    Compares the distance between entity's in the parsed array.

cba_fnc_getpos.title: CBA_fnc_getPos
cba_fnc_getpos.description: A function used to get the position of an entity.

cba_fnc_getobjectconfig.title: CBA_fnc_getObjectConfig
cba_fnc_getobjectconfig.description: A function used to return the config of an object or class name.

cba_fnc_getterrainprofile.title: CBA_fnc_getTerrainProfile
cba_fnc_getterrainprofile.description: A function used to find the terrain profile between two positions

cba_fnc_getmuzzles.title: CBA_fnc_getMuzzles
cba_fnc_getmuzzles.description: Gets the list of possible muzzles for a weapon.

cba_fnc_getsharedgroup.title: CBA_fnc_getSharedGroup
cba_fnc_getsharedgroup.description: Returns existing group on side, or newly created group when not existent.

cba_fnc_getturret.title: CBA_fnc_getTurret
cba_fnc_getturret.description: A function used to find out which config turret is turretpath.

cba_fnc_getunitdeathanim.title: CBA_fnc_getUnitDeathAnim
cba_fnc_getunitdeathanim.description: Get death animation for a unit.

cba_fnc_getunitanim.title: CBA_fnc_getUnitAnim
cba_fnc_getunitanim.description: Get information about a unit's stance and speed.

cba_fnc_getweaponmodes.title: CBA_fnc_getWeaponModes
cba_fnc_getweaponmodes.description: Gets the list of possible modes for a weapon.

cba_fnc_getmagazineindex.title: CBA_fnc_getMagazineIndex
cba_fnc_getmagazineindex.description: Finds out the magazine ID of all magazines of given type in the inventory of given unit.

cba_fnc_getvolume.title: CBA_fnc_getVolume
cba_fnc_getvolume.description:
Return the volume of the bounding box of an object's model.
    The bounding box is retrieved using boundingBoxReal instead of boundingBox
    with visual clipping type for more precise measurements.

cba_fnc_headdir.title: CBA_fnc_headDir
cba_fnc_headdir.description:
Get the direction of a unit's head.

    For anyone except the local player,    the head is assumed to be facing
    straight forward.

cba_fnc_isalive.title: CBA_fnc_isAlive
cba_fnc_isalive.description: A function used to find out if the group or object is alive.

cba_fnc_inheritsfrom.title: CBA_fnc_inheritsFrom
cba_fnc_inheritsfrom.description:
Checks whether a config entry inherits, directly or indirectly, from another
    one.

    For objects, it is probably simpler to use the *isKindOf* command.

cba_fnc_isterrainobject.title: CBA_fnc_isTerrainObject
cba_fnc_isterrainobject.description: Check if object is a terrain object.

cba_fnc_mapdirto.title: CBA_fnc_mapDirTo
cba_fnc_mapdirto.description: Gets the direction between two map grid references.

cba_fnc_isperson.title: CBA_fnc_isPerson
cba_fnc_isperson.description: Checks if an object is a person - soldier or civilian.

cba_fnc_isturnedout.title: CBA_fnc_isTurnedOut
cba_fnc_isturnedout.description: Checks whether a unit is turned out in a vehicle or not.

cba_fnc_isunitgetoutanim.title: CBA_fnc_isUnitGetOutAnim
cba_fnc_isunitgetoutanim.description:
Checks whether a unit is turned out in a vehicle or not.

    DEPRECATED. Use isTurnedOut instead.

cba_fnc_maprelpos.title: CBA_fnc_mapRelPos
cba_fnc_maprelpos.description:
Find a position relative to a known position on the map.

    Passing strings in for the Northing and Easting is the preferred way.

cba_fnc_mapgridtopos.title: CBA_fnc_mapGridToPos
cba_fnc_mapgridtopos.description: Converts a 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 digit grid reference into a Position.

cba_fnc_modelheaddir.title: CBA_fnc_modelHeadDir
cba_fnc_modelheaddir.description:
Get the direction of any unit's head.

    This can be used on any character model provided it has the "neck" and
    "pilot" mem points defined in the model.

    This works for proxy models as well!

cba_fnc_northingreversed.title: CBA_fnc_northingReversed
cba_fnc_northingreversed.description: Checks if the maps northing is reversed (like Chernarus & Utes, or any map pre-OA)

cba_fnc_objectrandom.title: CBA_fnc_objectRandom
cba_fnc_objectrandom.description: Creates a "random" number 0-9 based on an object's velocity

cba_fnc_nearplayer.title: CBA_fnc_nearPlayer
cba_fnc_nearplayer.description: Check whether these are any players within a certain distance of a unit.

cba_fnc_randomizefacewear.title: CBA_fnc_randomizeFacewear

cba_fnc_players.title: CBA_fnc_players
cba_fnc_players.description:
Reports all (human) player objects. Does not include headless client entities.

    Unlike "BIS_fnc_listPlayers", this function will not report the game logics of headless clients.

cba_fnc_randposarea.title: CBA_fnc_randPosArea
cba_fnc_randposarea.description:
Find a random (uniformly distributed) position within the given area without rejection sampling.

    * You can use <CBA_fnc_randPos> to find a position within a simple radius.

cba_fnc_randpos.title: CBA_fnc_randPos
cba_fnc_randpos.description: A function used to randomize a position around a given center

cba_fnc_realheight.title: CBA_fnc_realHeight
cba_fnc_realheight.description: Real z coordinate of an object, for placing stuff on roofs, etc.

cba_fnc_registerfeaturecamera.title: CBA_fnc_registerFeatureCamera
cba_fnc_registerfeaturecamera.description: Registers a feature camera for use with CBA_fnc_getActiveFeatureCamera.

cba_fnc_removebackpackcargo.title: CBA_fnc_removeBackpackCargo
cba_fnc_removebackpackcargo.description:
Removes specific backpack(s) from cargo space.

    Warning: All weapon attachments/magazines in all backpacks in container will become detached.
    Warning: Preset weapons without non-preset parents will get their attachments readded (engine limitation).

cba_fnc_removebinocularmagazine.title: CBA_fnc_removeBinocularMagazine
cba_fnc_removebinocularmagazine.description: Removes the magazine of the units rangefinder.

cba_fnc_removeitem.title: CBA_fnc_removeItem
cba_fnc_removeitem.description:
Remove an item.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to remove _item from _unit true in case of success.

cba_fnc_removemagazine.title: CBA_fnc_removeMagazine
cba_fnc_removemagazine.description:
Remove a magazine.

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to remove _item from _unit true in case of success.

cba_fnc_removeitemcargo.title: CBA_fnc_removeItemCargo
cba_fnc_removeitemcargo.description:
Removes specific item(s) from cargo space.

    Warning: All weapon attachments/magazines in containers in container will become detached.
    Warning: Preset weapons without non-preset parents will get their attachments readded (engine limitation).

cba_fnc_removeperframehandler.title: CBA_fnc_removePerFrameHandler
cba_fnc_removeperframehandler.description: Remove a handler that you have added using CBA_fnc_addPerFrameHandler.

cba_fnc_removeweapon.title: CBA_fnc_removeWeapon
cba_fnc_removeweapon.description:
Remove a weapon (including binocular).

    Function which verifies existence of _item and _unit, returns false in case
    of trouble, or when able to remove _item from _unit true in case of success.

cba_fnc_removemagazinecargo.title: CBA_fnc_removeMagazineCargo
cba_fnc_removemagazinecargo.description: Removes specific magazine(s) from cargo space.

cba_fnc_selectweapon.title: CBA_fnc_selectWeapon
cba_fnc_selectweapon.description:
Selects a weapon including correctly selecting a weapon mode of specified.

    Has to be executed on the machine where the unit is local.

cba_fnc_removeweaponcargo.title: CBA_fnc_removeWeaponCargo
cba_fnc_removeweaponcargo.description:
Removes specific weapon(s) from cargo space.

    Warning: All weapon attachments/magazines in container will become detached.
    Warning: Preset weapons without non-preset parents will get their attachments readded (engine limitation).

cba_fnc_removeplayeraction.title: CBA_fnc_removePlayerAction
cba_fnc_removeplayeraction.description: Removes player action previously added with <CBA_fnc_addPlayerAction>.

cba_fnc_setcallsign.title: CBA_fnc_setCallsign
cba_fnc_setcallsign.description:
Set call sign of a group.

    Works in SP, MP and Eden-Editor and at any point.

cba_fnc_setheight.title: CBA_fnc_setHeight
cba_fnc_setheight.description: A function used to set the height of an object

cba_fnc_setpos.title: CBA_fnc_setPos
cba_fnc_setpos.description: A function used to set the position of an entity.

cba_fnc_turretdir.title: CBA_fnc_turretDir
cba_fnc_turretdir.description: Reports azimuth and inclination of a vehicles turret.

cba_fnc_turretpath.title: CBA_fnc_turretPath
cba_fnc_turretpath.description:
Get a unit's turret path in the current vehicle.

    Reverse version of the turretUnit scripting command.

cba_fnc_uniqueunititems.title: CBA_fnc_uniqueUnitItems
cba_fnc_uniqueunititems.description: Retrievs a unique list of items in the units inventory.

cba_fnc_turretpathweapon.title: CBA_fnc_turretPathWeapon
cba_fnc_turretpathweapon.description:
Get the turret path belonging to a weapon of given vehicle.

    Reverse version of the weaponsTurret scripting command.

cba_fnc_vehiclerole.title: CBA_fnc_vehicleRole
cba_fnc_vehiclerole.description:
Get a unit's role in its current vehicle.

    Used because assignedVehicleRole reports the role assigned by the group leader instead of the current position.

cba_fnc_viewdir.title: CBA_fnc_viewDir
cba_fnc_viewdir.description: Reports azimuth and inclination of a units head or weapon direction.

cba_fnc_waitandexecute.title: CBA_fnc_waitAndExecute
cba_fnc_waitandexecute.description:
Executes a code once in unscheduled environment with a given game time delay.
    Note that unlike PFEH, the delay is in CBA_missionTime not diag_tickTime (will be adjusted for time accl).

cba_fnc_weaponcomponents.title: CBA_fnc_weaponComponents
cba_fnc_weaponcomponents.description:
Reports class name of base weapon without attachments and all attachments belonging to a pre equipped weapon.

    Base weapon and attachments are reported in lower case capitalization.
    Fixed version of BIS_fnc_weaponComponents.

cba_fnc_waituntilandexecute.title: CBA_fnc_waitUntilAndExecute
cba_fnc_waituntilandexecute.description:
Executes a code once in unscheduled environment after a condition is true.
    It's also possible to add a timeout >= 0, in which case a different code is executed.
    Then it will be waited until _timeout time has elapsed or _condition evaluates to true.

cba_fnc_adddisplayhandler.title: CBA_fnc_addDisplayHandler
cba_fnc_adddisplayhandler.description:
Adds an action to the main display.

    They are reapplied after loading a save game. Actions only persist for the
    mission and are removed after restart.

cba_fnc_addbiseventhandler.title: CBA_fnc_addBISEventHandler
cba_fnc_addbiseventhandler.description:
Adds an event handler with arguments.

    Additional arguments are passed as _thisArgs. The ID is passed as _thisID.

cba_fnc_addeventhandler.title: CBA_fnc_addEventHandler
cba_fnc_addeventhandler.description: Registers an event handler for a specific CBA event.

cba_fnc_addkeyhandlerfromconfig.title: CBA_fnc_addKeyHandlerFromConfig
cba_fnc_addkeyhandlerfromconfig.description: Adds an action to a keybind from config.

cba_fnc_addkeyhandler.title: CBA_fnc_addKeyHandler
cba_fnc_addkeyhandler.description: Adds an action to a keybind.

cba_fnc_addeventhandlerargs.title: CBA_fnc_addEventHandlerArgs
cba_fnc_addeventhandlerargs.description:
Registers an event handler for a specific CBA event with arguments.

    A event added with this function will have the following variables defined:
    _this     - Arguments passed by function calling the events. <ANY>
    _thisArgs - Arguments added to event by this function. <ANY>
    _thisId   - Same as the return value of this function. <NUMBER>
    _thisType - Name of the event. (Same as _eventName passed to this function) <STRING>
    _thisFnc  - Piece of code added to the event by this function <CODE>

cba_fnc_addplayereventhandler.title: CBA_fnc_addPlayerEventHandler
cba_fnc_addplayereventhandler.description:
Adds a player event handler.

    Possible events:
        "unit"          - player controlled unit changed
        "weapon"        - currently selected weapon change
        "turretweapon"  - currently selected turret weapon change
        "muzzle"        - currently selected muzzle change
        "weaponMode"    - currently selected weapon mode change
        "loadout"       - players loadout changed
        "vehicle"       - players current vehicle changed
        "turret"        - position in vehicle changed
        "visionMode"    - player changed to normal/night/thermal view
        "cameraView"    - camera mode changed ("Internal", "External", "Gunner" etc.)
        "featureCamera" - camera changed (Curator, Arsenal, Spectator etc.)
        "visibleMap"    - opened or closed map
        "group"         - player group changes
        "leader"        - leader of player changes

cba_fnc_addmarkereventhandler.title: CBA_fnc_addMarkerEventHandler
cba_fnc_addmarkereventhandler.description: Adds an event handler that executes code when a marker is created or deleted.

cba_fnc_changekeyhandler.title: CBA_fnc_changeKeyHandler
cba_fnc_changekeyhandler.description: Changes the key of a key handler.

cba_fnc_globaleventjip.title: CBA_fnc_globalEventJIP
cba_fnc_globaleventjip.description:
Raises a CBA event on all machines.

    Event is put on a stack that is executed on every future JIP machine.
    Stack can be overwritten by using the same JIP-Stack-ID.

cba_fnc_globalevent.title: CBA_fnc_globalEvent
cba_fnc_globalevent.description: Raises a CBA event on all machines, including the local one.

cba_fnc_localevent.title: CBA_fnc_localEvent
cba_fnc_localevent.description: Raises a CBA event on the local machine.

cba_events_fnc_playerevent.title: CBA_events_fnc_playerEvent
cba_events_fnc_playerevent.description: Poll player event states and possibly raise events on state change.

cba_fnc_ownerevent.title: CBA_fnc_ownerEvent
cba_fnc_ownerevent.description: Raises a CBA event on the target client ID's machine.

cba_fnc_remoteevent.title: CBA_fnc_remoteEvent
cba_fnc_remoteevent.description: Raises a CBA event on all machines, except the local one.

cba_fnc_registerchatcommand.title: CBA_fnc_registerChatCommand
cba_fnc_registerchatcommand.description: Register a custom chat command on the local machine.

cba_fnc_removeeventhandler.title: CBA_fnc_removeEventHandler
cba_fnc_removeeventhandler.description: Removes an event handler previously registered with CBA_fnc_addEventHandler.

cba_fnc_removekeyhandler.title: CBA_fnc_removeKeyHandler
cba_fnc_removekeyhandler.description: Removes an action from a keybind.

cba_fnc_removedisplayhandler.title: CBA_fnc_removeDisplayHandler
cba_fnc_removedisplayhandler.description: Removes an action from the main display.

cba_fnc_removeglobaleventjip.title: CBA_fnc_removeGlobalEventJIP
cba_fnc_removeglobaleventjip.description: Removes a globalEventJIP ID. Optionaly will wait until an object is deleted.

cba_fnc_removemarkereventhandler.title: CBA_fnc_removeMarkerEventHandler
cba_fnc_removemarkereventhandler.description: Removes an event handler previously registered with 'CBA_fnc_addMarkerEventHandler'.

cba_fnc_serverevent.title: CBA_fnc_serverEvent
cba_fnc_serverevent.description: Raises a CBA event on the server machine.

cba_fnc_turretevent.title: CBA_fnc_turretEvent
cba_fnc_turretevent.description: Raises a CBA event on the machine where the vehicle's turret is local.

cba_fnc_targetevent.title: CBA_fnc_targetEvent
cba_fnc_targetevent.description: Raises a CBA event on all machines where this object or at least one of these objects are local.

cba_fnc_weaponevents.title: CBA_fnc_weaponEvents

cba_fnc_addunittrackprojectiles.title: CBA_fnc_addUnitTrackProjectiles
cba_fnc_addunittrackprojectiles.description:
Adds projectile tracking to a given unit or vehicle.
    Will show colored lines following a projectile's path.

cba_fnc_debug.title: CBA_fnc_debug
cba_fnc_debug.description:
General Purpose Debug Message Writer

    Handles very long messages without losing text.

cba_diagnostic_fnc_inittargetdebugconsol.title: CBA_diagnostic_fnc_initTargetDebugConsole
cba_diagnostic_fnc_inittargetdebugconsol.description:
Adds additional watch statements that are run on a remote target and have their values returned to the client.
    Requires `EnableTargetDebug = 1;` in addon root config or description.ext or 3den scenario attribute with the same name

cba_fnc_test.title: CBA_fnc_test
cba_fnc_test.description: Runs unit tests for an addon or component.

cba_fnc_removeunittrackprojectiles.title: CBA_fnc_removeUnitTrackProjectiles
cba_fnc_removeunittrackprojectiles.description: Removes projectile tracking from a given unit or vehicle.

cba_fnc_deserializenamespace.title: CBA_fnc_deserializeNamespace
cba_fnc_deserializenamespace.description: Creates namespace containing all variables stored in a CBA hash.

cba_fnc_encodejson.title: CBA_fnc_encodeJSON
cba_fnc_encodejson.description:
Serializes input to a JSON string. Can handle
    - ARRAY
    - BOOL
    - CONTROL
    - GROUP
    - LOCATION
    - NAMESPACE
    - NIL (ANY)
    - NUMBER
    - OBJECT
    - STRING
    - TASK
    - TEAM_MEMBER
    - Everything else will simply be stringified.

cba_fnc_hasheachpair.title: CBA_fnc_hashEachPair
cba_fnc_hasheachpair.description:
Iterate through all keys and values in a Hash.

    Data passed to the function on each iteration,
    * _key - Key from the Hash.
    * _value - The value from the Hash corresponding to _key.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_hashfilter.title: CBA_fnc_hashFilter
cba_fnc_hashfilter.description:
Iterate through all keys and values in a Hash.
    If function returns false, the key is removed from the hash (just like `[] select {}`)

    Data passed to the function on each iteration,
    * _key - Key from the Hash.
    * _value - The value from the Hash corresponding to _key.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_hashkeys.title: CBA_fnc_hashKeys
cba_fnc_hashkeys.description:
Returns all Keys in a Hash.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_hashget.title: CBA_fnc_hashGet
cba_fnc_hashget.description:
Gets a value for a given key from a Hash.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_hashhaskey.title: CBA_fnc_hashHasKey
cba_fnc_hashhaskey.description:
Check if a Hash has a value defined for a key.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_hashset.title: CBA_fnc_hashSet
cba_fnc_hashset.description:
Sets a value for a given key in a Hash.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_hashrem.title: CBA_fnc_hashRem
cba_fnc_hashrem.description:
Removes given key from given Hash.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_hashvalues.title: CBA_fnc_hashValues
cba_fnc_hashvalues.description:
Returns all values in a Hash.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_hashsize.title: CBA_fnc_hashSize
cba_fnc_hashsize.description: Get number of elements in a Hash.

cba_fnc_ishash.title: CBA_fnc_isHash
cba_fnc_ishash.description:
Check if a value is a Hash data structure.

    See <CBA_fnc_hashCreate>.

cba_fnc_serializenamespace.title: CBA_fnc_serializeNamespace
cba_fnc_serializenamespace.description: Creates CBA hash containing all variables stored in a namespace.

cba_fnc_parseyaml.title: CBA_fnc_parseYAML
cba_fnc_parseyaml.description:
Parses a YAML file into a nested array/Hash structure.

    See also: <CBA_fnc_dataPath>

cba_fnc_addkeybind.title: CBA_fnc_addKeybind
cba_fnc_addkeybind.description:
Adds or updates the keybind handler for a specified mod action, and associates
    a function with that keybind being pressed.

    This file should be included for readable DIK codes:
        #include "\a3\ui_f\hpp\defineDIKCodes.inc"

    Additional DIK codes usable with this function:
        0xF0: Left mouse button
        0xF1: Right mouse button
        0xF2: Middle mouse button
        0xF3: Mouse #4
        0xF4: Mouse #5
        0xF5: Mouse #6
        0xF6: Mouse #7
        0xF7: Mouse #8
        0xF8: Mouse wheel up
        0xF9: Mouse wheel down

        0xFA: Custom user action 1
        0xFB: Custom user action 2
        0xFC: Custom user action 3
        0xFD: Custom user action 4
        0xFE: Custom user action 5
        0xFF: Custom user action 6
        0x100: Custom user action 7
        0x101: Custom user action 8
        0x102: Custom user action 9
        0x103: Custom user action 10
        0x104: Custom user action 11
        0x105: Custom user action 12
        0x106: Custom user action 13
        0x107: Custom user action 14
        0x108: Custom user action 15
        0x109: Custom user action 16
        0x10A: Custom user action 17
        0x10B: Custom user action 18
        0x10C: Custom user action 19
        0x10D: Custom user action 20

cba_fnc_getkeybind.title: CBA_fnc_getKeybind
cba_fnc_getkeybind.description:
Checks if a particular mod has already registered a keybind handler for the
 specified action.

cba_fnc_addkeybindtofleximenu.title: CBA_fnc_addKeybindToFleximenu
cba_fnc_addkeybindtofleximenu.description: Adds or updates the keybind handler for a defined Fleximenu and creates that Fleximenu.

cba_fnc_registerkeybindmodprettyname.title: CBA_fnc_registerKeybindModPrettyName
cba_fnc_registerkeybindmodprettyname.description: Associates a pretty name to a keybinding mod entry.

cba_fnc_localizekey.title: CBA_fnc_localizeKey
cba_fnc_localizekey.description: Translate DIK code and modifier keys to readable keybind.

cba_fnc_registerkeybindtofleximenu.title: CBA_fnc_registerKeybindToFleximenu
cba_fnc_registerkeybindtofleximenu.description: Adds or updates the keybind handler for a defined Fleximenu and creates that Fleximenu.

cba_fnc_moduleattack.title: CBA_fnc_moduleAttack
cba_fnc_moduleattack.description:
A function for commanding a group to attack a location with information
    parsed from a module.

cba_fnc_getposfromstring.title: CBA_fnc_getPosFromString
cba_fnc_getposfromstring.description:
A function used to get the position of an item when passed as a string.

    Designed with modules in mind since information can, presently, only be passed as a string
    or scalar. The type name needs to be passed along with the item so the function knows
    how to extract the desired position.

cba_fnc_moduledefend.title: CBA_fnc_moduleDefend
cba_fnc_moduledefend.description:
A function for commanding a group to defend a location with information
    parsed from a module.

cba_fnc_modulepatrol.title: CBA_fnc_modulePatrol
cba_fnc_modulepatrol.description:
A function for commanding a group to patrol a location with information
    parsed from a module.

cba_fnc_compilemusic.title: CBA_fnc_compileMusic
cba_fnc_compilemusic.description: A function used to gather a list of all music classes

cba_fnc_findmusic.title: CBA_fnc_findMusic
cba_fnc_findmusic.description: A function used to return songs with given type and tags

cba_fnc_getmusicpath.title: CBA_fnc_getMusicPath
cba_fnc_getmusicpath.description: A function used to return the config path of a music file

cba_fnc_getmusicplaying.title: CBA_fnc_getMusicPlaying
cba_fnc_getmusicplaying.description: A function used to return the current time on playing music. Must have been started with CBA_fnc_playMusic

cba_fnc_playmusic.title: CBA_fnc_playMusic
cba_fnc_playmusic.description: A function used to play music.

cba_fnc_getmusicdata.title: CBA_fnc_getMusicData
cba_fnc_getmusicdata.description: A function used to return data from the given music class

cba_fnc_ismusicplaying.title: CBA_fnc_isMusicPlaying
cba_fnc_ismusicplaying.description: Function that checks if music is currently playing

cba_fnc_stopmusic.title: CBA_fnc_stopMusic
cba_fnc_stopmusic.description: A function used to stop any music playing.

cba_fnc_globalexecute.title: CBA_fnc_globalExecute
cba_fnc_globalexecute.description:
Executes code on given destinations.

    DEPRECATED. Use <remoteExec at https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/remoteExec> instead.

cba_fnc_publicvariable.title: CBA_fnc_publicVariable
cba_fnc_publicvariable.description:
Broadcast a variables value to all machines. Used to reduce network traffic.

    Does only broadcast the new value if it doesn't exist in missionNamespace or
    if the new value is different to the one in missionNamespace.
    Nil as value gets always broadcasted.

cba_fnc_globalsay.title: CBA_fnc_globalSay
cba_fnc_globalsay.description:
Says sound on all clients.

    DEPRECATED. Use <remoteExec at https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/remoteExec> ["say"] instead.

cba_fnc_globalsay3d.title: CBA_fnc_globalSay3d
cba_fnc_globalsay3d.description:
Says sound on all clients in 3D.

    DEPRECATED. Use <remoteExec at https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/remoteExec> ["say3D"] instead.

cba_fnc_setvarnet.title: CBA_fnc_setVarNet
cba_fnc_setvarnet.description:
Broadcast a object variable value to all machines. Used to reduce network traffic.

    Does only broadcast the new value if it doesn't exist in the object namespace or
    if the new value is different to the one in object namespace.
    Nil as value gets always broadcasted.

cba_optics_fnc_setopticmagnification.title: cba_optics_fnc_setOpticMagnification
cba_optics_fnc_setopticmagnification.description: Set magnification of the current optic of the unit.

cba_optics_fnc_setopticmagnificationhelp.title: cba_optics_fnc_setOpticMagnificationHelper
cba_optics_fnc_setopticmagnificationhelp.description: Helper function used in config to set the magnification of a zooming optic.

cba_optics_fnc_setopticmagnificationhelp.title: cba_optics_fnc_setOpticMagnificationHelperZeroing
cba_optics_fnc_setopticmagnificationhelp.description: Helper function used in config to remember the zeroing of a zooming optic.

cba_fnc_addsetting.title: CBA_fnc_addSetting
cba_fnc_addsetting.description: Creates a new setting for that session.

cba_statemachine_fnc_addstate.title: CBA_statemachine_fnc_addState
cba_statemachine_fnc_addstate.description: Adds a state to a state machine.

cba_statemachine_fnc_clockwork.title: CBA_statemachine_fnc_clockwork
cba_statemachine_fnc_clockwork.description: Clockwork which runs all state machines.

cba_statemachine_fnc_addeventtransition.title: CBA_statemachine_fnc_addEventTransition
cba_statemachine_fnc_addeventtransition.description: Creates a transition between two states.

cba_statemachine_fnc_createfromconfig.title: CBA_statemachine_fnc_createFromConfig
cba_statemachine_fnc_createfromconfig.description: Creates a state machine from a config class.

cba_statemachine_fnc_dumpperformancecoun.title: CBA_statemachine_fnc_dumpPerformanceCounters
cba_statemachine_fnc_dumpperformancecoun.description:
Dumps the performance counters for each statemachine
    Requires `STATEMACHINE_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS` in script_component.hpp
    Note that diag_tickTime has very limited precision; results may become more accurate with longer test runtime.

cba_statemachine_fnc_addtransition.title: CBA_statemachine_fnc_addTransition
cba_statemachine_fnc_addtransition.description: Creates a transition between two states.

cba_statemachine_fnc_tostring.title: CBA_statemachine_fnc_toString
cba_statemachine_fnc_tostring.description: Creates a readable string representation of a state machine.

cba_statemachine_fnc_updatelist.title: CBA_statemachine_fnc_updateList
cba_statemachine_fnc_updatelist.description: Manually updates the list of a state machine.

cba_fnc_capitalize.title: CBA_fnc_capitalize
cba_fnc_capitalize.description: Upper case the first letter of the string, lower case the rest.

cba_fnc_decodeurl.title: CBA_fnc_decodeURL
cba_fnc_decodeurl.description: Reverse URL encoded text to readable text.

cba_fnc_find.title: CBA_fnc_find
cba_fnc_find.description: Finds a string within another string.

cba_fnc_floattostring.title: CBA_fnc_floatToString
cba_fnc_floattostring.description:
Returns a higher precision string representation of a IEEE 754 floating point
    number than the str function.

    This function is as barebones as possible. Inline macro version of this
    function can be used with FLOAT_TO_STRING(num).

cba_fnc_formatelapsedtime.title: CBA_fnc_formatElapsedTime
cba_fnc_formatelapsedtime.description:
Formats time in seconds according to a format.

    Intended to show time elapsed, rather than time-of-day.

cba_fnc_lefttrim.title: CBA_fnc_leftTrim
cba_fnc_lefttrim.description:
Trims specified characters (all whitespace by default) from the left end of a string.

    See <CBA_fnc_rightTrim> and <CBA_fnc_trim>.

cba_fnc_replace.title: CBA_fnc_replace
cba_fnc_replace.description: Replaces substrings within a string. Case-dependent.

cba_fnc_formatnumber.title: CBA_fnc_formatNumber
cba_fnc_formatnumber.description:
Formats a number to a minimum integer width and to a specific number of
    decimal places.

    The formatting includes padding with 0s and correct rounding. Numbers
    are always displayed fully, never being condensed using an exponent (e.g.
    the number 1.234e9 would be given as "1234000000").

    Additionally, if required, it will separate the integer part of the number
    with the appropriate thousands seperators as, for example,
    "21,002" or "1,000,000".

cba_fnc_removewhitespace.title: CBA_fnc_removeWhitespace
cba_fnc_removewhitespace.description: Removes whitespace (space, tab, newline) from string.

cba_fnc_sanitizehtml.title: CBA_fnc_sanitizeHTML
cba_fnc_sanitizehtml.description: Replaces all < > and & with HTML character codes.

cba_fnc_righttrim.title: CBA_fnc_rightTrim
cba_fnc_righttrim.description:
Trims specified characters (all whitespace by default) from the right end of a string.

    See <CBA_fnc_leftTrim> and <CBA_fnc_trim>.

cba_fnc_split.title: CBA_fnc_split
cba_fnc_split.description: Splits a string into substrings using a separator. Inverse of <CBA_fnc_join>.

cba_fnc_strlen.title: CBA_fnc_strLen
cba_fnc_strlen.description: Counts the number of characters in a string.

cba_fnc_substring.title: CBA_fnc_substring
cba_fnc_substring.description: Extracts the index-based substring from a string.

cba_fnc_substr.title: CBA_fnc_substr
cba_fnc_substr.description:
Retrieves a substring of this instance.

    The substring starts at a specified character position and has a specified length.

cba_fnc_trim.title: CBA_fnc_trim
cba_fnc_trim.description:
Trims specified characters (all whitespace by default) from the both ends of a string.

    See <CBA_fnc_leftTrim> and <CBA_fnc_rightTrim>.

cba_fnc_additemcontextmenuoption.title: CBA_fnc_addItemContextMenuOption
cba_fnc_additemcontextmenuoption.description: Adds context menu option to inventory display.

cba_fnc_addpausemenuoption.title: CBA_fnc_addPauseMenuOption
cba_fnc_addpausemenuoption.description: Adds a menu option to the ESC menu "Options" tab.

cba_fnc_getfov.title: CBA_fnc_getFov
cba_fnc_getfov.description:
Get current camera's vertical field of view in radians and zoom.

    Zoom is relative to specified config FOV, defaults to 0.75 (vehicle driver initFov).

cba_fnc_getaspectratio.title: CBA_fnc_getAspectRatio
cba_fnc_getaspectratio.description: Used to determine the Aspect ratio of the screen.

cba_fnc_getuisize.title: CBA_fnc_getUISize
cba_fnc_getuisize.description: Used to determine the UI size of the screen.

cba_fnc_notify.title: CBA_fnc_notify
cba_fnc_notify.description: Display a text message. Multiple incoming messages are queued.

cba_fnc_progressbar.title: CBA_fnc_progressBar
cba_fnc_progressbar.description: Opens a progress bar. Closes the currently active progress bar.

cba_fnc_polar2vect.title: CBA_fnc_polar2vect
cba_fnc_polar2vect.description: Creates a vector based on a inputted magnitude, direction and elevation

cba_fnc_matrixproduct3d.title: CBA_fnc_matrixProduct3D
cba_fnc_matrixproduct3d.description:
Returns the resulting matrix from the matrix-matrix product.

    Only accepts 3x3 matrices.

    DEPRECATED. Use matrixMultiply instead.

cba_fnc_matrixtranspose.title: CBA_fnc_matrixTranspose
cba_fnc_matrixtranspose.description:
Returns the transposed matrix.

    Accepts any mxn matrix.

    DEPRECATED. Use matrixTranspose instead.

cba_fnc_scalevect.title: CBA_fnc_scaleVect
cba_fnc_scalevect.description: scales a specified vector by a specified factor.

cba_fnc_randomvector3d.title: CBA_fnc_randomVector3D
cba_fnc_randomvector3d.description: Returns a 3 dimensional unit vector that is pointing in a random direction.

cba_fnc_simplifyangle.title: CBA_fnc_simplifyAngle
cba_fnc_simplifyangle.description:
Returns an equivalent angle to the specified angle in the range 0 to 360.

    If the input angle is in the range 0 to 360, it will be returned unchanged.

cba_fnc_scalevectto.title: CBA_fnc_scaleVectTo
cba_fnc_scalevectto.description: scales a vector so that its new Magnitude is equivalent to a specified value.

cba_fnc_simplifyangle180.title: CBA_fnc_simplifyAngle180
cba_fnc_simplifyangle180.description:
Returns an equivalent angle to the specified angle in the range -180 to 180.

    If the input angle is in the range -180 to 180, it will be returned unchanged.

cba_fnc_vectcross2d.title: CBA_fnc_vectCross2D
cba_fnc_vectcross2d.description:
Returns the cross product vector of two 2D vectors.

    The result is an integer value (positive or negative), representing the
    magnitude of the height component.

cba_fnc_vectcross.title: CBA_fnc_vectCross
cba_fnc_vectcross.description:
Returns the cross product vector of two vectors.

   Vectors must both be three dimensional.

cba_fnc_vectadd.title: CBA_fnc_vectAdd
cba_fnc_vectadd.description: Returns the sum of two vectors.  Vectors can be 2D or 3D

cba_fnc_vectdir.title: CBA_fnc_vectDir
cba_fnc_vectdir.description: Returns the angle of a vector with the given i and k coordinates in the range 0 to 360.

cba_fnc_vectdot.title: CBA_fnc_vectDot
cba_fnc_vectdot.description:
Returns the dot product of two vectors.
    Vectors can be either two or three dimesions, but they must be the same dimension.

cba_fnc_vectelev.title: CBA_fnc_vectElev
cba_fnc_vectelev.description: Returns the angle of elevation of a 3D vector with the given i, j and k coordinates in the range -90 to 90.

cba_fnc_vectmagn.title: CBA_fnc_vectMagn
cba_fnc_vectmagn.description: Returns the magnitude of a 3D vector with the given i, j and k coordinates.

cba_fnc_vectmagn2d.title: CBA_fnc_vectMagn2D
cba_fnc_vectmagn2d.description: Returns the magnitude of a vector with the given i and k coordinates or the magnitude of the i and k components of a 3D vector.

cba_fnc_vectmap3d.title: CBA_fnc_vectMap3D
cba_fnc_vectmap3d.description:
Returns the resulting vector of the matrix-vector product.

    Only accepts a 3x3 matrix and 3D vector.

cba_fnc_vectrotate3d.title: CBA_fnc_vectRotate3D
cba_fnc_vectrotate3d.description: Rotates the first vector around the second, clockwise by theta degrees.

cba_fnc_vectsubtract.title: CBA_fnc_vectSubtract
cba_fnc_vectsubtract.description: Returns the difference of two vectors.  Vectors can be 2D or 3D.

cba_fnc_compileeventhandlers.title: CBA_fnc_compileEventHandlers
cba_fnc_compileeventhandlers.description: Compiles all Extended EventHandlers in given config.

cba_fnc_addclasseventhandler.title: CBA_fnc_addClassEventHandler
cba_fnc_addclasseventhandler.description: Add an eventhandler to a class and all children.

args.name: _eventName
args.desc: The type of the eventhandler. E.g. "init", "fired", "killed" etc.

args.name: _eventFunc
args.desc: Function to execute when event happens.

cba_fnc_compilefunction.title: CBA_fnc_compileFunction
cba_fnc_compilefunction.description:
Compiles a function into mission namespace and into ui namespace for caching purposes.
    Recompiling can be enabled by inserting the CBA_cache_disable.pbo from the optionals folder.

cba_fnc_init.title: CBA_fnc_init
cba_fnc_init.description:
Runs Init and InitPost event handlers on this object.
    Internal use only.

cba_fnc_vectrotate2d.title: CBA_fnc_vectRotate2D
